replies.body: I really want to know who the moon land walker is, could it be {{champion:131}}, but she is from mount targon, who could it be? could there be a new champion following the story? we might never know?

> [{quoted}](name=dayfalls,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fMejeMuT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-09T10:52:57.996+0000)
>
> I really want to know who the moon land walker is, could it be {{champion:131}}, but she is from mount targon, who could it be? could there be a new champion following the story? we might never know?

thats who I thought when I read it.

I love when they do stuff like this, it really breathes even more life into the champions :P

And not to spoil it for anyone who hasn't read it, but i never thought of 'that place' being accessible underwater :P
 so cool, so many interesting pathways to add to the story of Runeterra.

It's awesome how they cater to everyone's likes. The story line doesn't appeal to me as much as something like the visuals and tweaks they make and explain. 

Woo go riot lol
